0.Major_Activities1: Training workshop with monks of Korzok gonpa (Ladakh) on intangible cultural heritage. Documentation of objects in monastery for museum. Livelihood project for women weavers of Korzok . Environment preservation by setting up water refill unit in Korzok. Cultural and natural heritage documentation of Korzok nomadic landscape. In print children book on folk stories of Korzok nomadic community. A nature guides training as part of an eco tourism project is planned for Changpa youth in 2021 summer.

source_info.purpose: Company was registered in February and commenced work in April 2018.
